name: brightforce
description: Brightforce is a curated vetted 2.0 Freelance Marketplace
@comment scripts: start: starts the server without watching
stop: stops the server
migrate:up: run migrate
server: starts the server and watchs for changes
main: runs the main app on a local dev server
company: runs the company app on a local dev server
talent: runs the talent app on a local dev server
admin: runs the admin app on a local dev server
dev-main: starts both the server and the main app dev server
dev-company: starts both the server and the company app dev server
dev-talent: starts both the server and the talent app dev server
dev-admin: starts both the server and the admin app dev server
test-staging: runs all cypress test on staging server
test-local: runs test on local url
run-test-local: runs the server and run all tests locally
build-test-local: builds all apps and runs all tests locally
build-local: builds all clients locally
build-main: install dependencies and builds the main app (used for deployments)
build-company: install dependencies and builds the company app (used for deployments)
build-talent: install dependencies and builds the talent app (used for deployments)
build-admin: install dependencies and builds the admin app (used for deployments)
build: build and installs all dependencies and apps (used for deployments)
heroku-postbuild: builds the app on the heroku server

scripts.build-local: npm run build --prefix client_main && npm run build --prefix client_company && npm run build --prefix client_talent && npm run build --prefix client_admin
scripts.build-main: npm install --prefix client_main && npm run build --prefix client_main
scripts.build-company: npm install --prefix client_company && npm run build --prefix client_company
scripts.build-talent: npm install --prefix client_talent && npm run build --prefix client_talent
scripts.build-admin: npm install --prefix client_admin && npm run build --prefix client_admin
scripts.build-sharedcomponents: npm install --prefix sharedcomponents && npm install --only=dev --prefix sharedcomponents && npm run build --prefix sharedcomponents
scripts.build: npm run build-main && npm run build-company && npm run build-talent && npm run build-admin

author: BrightForce
